ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Fly stocks obtained from the Bloomington Drosophila Stock Center (NIH P40-OD018537) and Dr. Christopher Potter were used in this study. We thank the Transgenic RNAi Project (TRiP) at the Harvard Medical School (NIH-NIGMS R01-GM084947) for making transgenic RNAi stocks. Monoclonal antibodies were obtained from the Developmental Studies Hybridoma Bank developed under the auspices of the NICHD and maintained by the University of Iowa, Department of Biology, Iowa City, IA 52242. These studies were supported by NIH R01-AG057331 to E.F. and M.B.F. and R01-NS098821 to M.B.F.
